scripts.dev: rm -rf build && concurrently --raw 'tgb dev' 'sleep 3 && nodemon --delay 1 --quiet --watch build --exec "NODE_PATH=build NODE_ENV=development node build/index"'
scripts.build: rm -rf build && NODE_ENV=production tgb build && cp package.json build; if [ ! -f ".env.production" ]; then cp .env.development .env.production; fi; cp .env.production build
